channel.title: [PI] Stopping macro's
channel.description: I am trying to stop macroing on the chest I added for exp and the net I added for agility exp. I added an interface that pops up, you can click really fast and it goes away. How can I make you have to wait 3 seconds for the next click?

item.title: [PI] Stopping macro's
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Do something like this;

case OBJECT:
    if (c.lastXPClick - System.currentTimeMillis() < AMOUNT_OF_SECONDS) { // Checks if the last click was a few seconds ago
        if (c.clickedTimes < 10) { // Checks to see if the user clicked the chest less than 10 times in the given time
            / * Handle actions */
            c.lastXPClick = System.currentTimeMillis(); // Sets the lastXPClick to the current time
        } else {
            c.disconnected = true; // Disconnects the user for mass clicking
        }
    } else {
        c.clickedTimes++; // Increments the clickedTimes variable
    }
    break;

This is only a template-type system and will need to be modified.[/quote]
T.T I don’t know how I would modify it :S what would I do?

Read full topic
